root:
Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.
Divine Storm Holy Light Judgment Hammer of Justice Free Action
Crusader Strike Holy Light Judgment Sacred Shield Divine Storm Blessing of Freedom Hammer of Justice Move Crusader Strike Holy Light Judgment Sacred Shield Divine Storm Blessing of Freedom Hammer of Justice
Challenger's Greatsword Rival's Greatsword Duelist's Greatsword Gladiator's Greatsword "Runed Greatsword" Cataclysmic Gladiator's Greatsword Challenger's Armor Rival's Armor Duelist's Armor Gladiator's Armor "Arbiter's Armor" Cataclysmic Gladiator's Armor
Others:
One step closer to home.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Hope Vengeance Cleanse Eye for an Eye Blessing of Kings
Seal of Command Seal of Insight "This is my last adventure. I will return home." Seal of Blood Wistful Locket "This is my last adventure. I will return home." Seal of Justice Seal of Sanctuary Seal of Vengeance Winds of Forgiveness "Forgive me of the evil I commit. I do it for our family." Offensive Skill
I did this daily in the arena. Why not use a spell? Out of mana! These are special Frostweave Bandages.
Like Stromgarde, this place has hope. Remain stout. The Light shines upon us. Hey, the worst is behind us.
If they're well armored, aim for joins and exposures. Stand with me. I'll defend you, my friend. You'll be fine with me-- I earned this blade.
My homeland was once a majestic military nation. It may be in ruins, but it'll live through me. I joined the defense of a legendary bridge in my youth. My nation fought alone for days-- but it held the line. We will, too. I dream of settling with my family. After this is finished, I'd like to be neighbors with you all.
My homeland was reduced to rubble. They'll pay for that. *He sharpens his blade with a whetstone, hypnotically focused.* My parents died to forest trolls. I enlisted the next day.
Breathe. The pain should subside. In my youth, I could use this spell non-stop! Now... Your face has some color again. Good.
My body won't break before they do. Let them target me. I'm used to it. "Focus the paladin!" Hah, never gets old.
...
No... Let this veteran rest. I'm comfortable as I am. I recall defending Thandol Span without you.
Justice. I will save my country. One fewer to pillage our granary, eh? My nation taught me war! What did yours teach you? I learned THAT in the arena! Break yourselves upon my body! Vengeance for Stromgarde!
A fierce veteran of holy purpose, he has come to cleanse this land through war and prayer. Deus Vult
No-- I must survive!
There are trolls in the bushes!
OF COURSE! Hit the paladin. An old strategy!
We're Light-forsaken scrubs.
I never get enough!
Stromgarde will remain a ruin...
I need more Conquest for my shoes!
Formations! Hold, and we'll claim victory!
I will defend you with my life!
Attack the back row. Control the front.
I'm a Gladiator. Let me show you why.
Stromgarde will grow again.
See these gems? They're STRENGTH!
Light, guide this knight if he is true!
We can manage-- with the right tactics. Remember, we have families awaiting us. Bring these villains to justice!
Pursue justice, for this world has none!
Blessing of Might! Go with my Blessing. A flash of light! I haven't forgotten my spells. If I die, who will rebuild Stromgarde? ... should I leave for home now? An unholy sight! The Witherbark lurk in the bushes! Trolls. Trolls everywhere. If there's a troll, there's an orc. Remember that. Hey, I specced ret! Hit me! Seal of Blood! Seal of Blood! You're so slow! I called for you minutes ago. ... I will never do arenas with you. Our party composition is garbage. Where's my potion!? I carry this team! I deserve the credit! You deserve nothing. Hordes of them surround my home... ... my home still lives by merit of war's boredom. ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. We can only buy armor one piece at a time in the arena! Gold? Why do we need gold to buy weapons and armor? Ah, we can't buy better weapons. We're not skilled enough. I... should return home. Let me fall back, I must write a letter. I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. One more scar for a veteran. Reach for my sword, and I'll trade you a fist. How I have MISSED arenas! Excuse me! I'd like a new sword! I have the points. Boots, please. This is the armor vendor, right? Ah, I was mistaken. Vendor's that way. Why do we have four in a 3v3? Seriously, why do we have four in a 3v3? Someone leave. I'll join my kinsmen in the afterlife... Why return to rubble? There is no higher rank than gladiator. This sword deserves a new gladiator. I earned this armor then, not now. I... can't recall where I should go. The glory is mine! I want top damage! I can 1v3, why should this stop me? No points, no paladin. Eh, I can find a better team. I'm done. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I must escape! No, I'll be rooted for days! They'll knock me out! It's a bad idea. Not for me! Just heal me and I'll do the rest. I'd rather find a better team. Forget me. Escape and live. It's not worth the effort. Regroup. ... it can't work. No mana! It's on cooldown! Can't use that in arena! What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Take a break. I got this. No worries-- I'll do something new. GET THEM! You're all garbage. WHY DID I JOIN YOU!? I'd rather fight solo. My judgment is better. HAH, get it!? Forget you. Every man for himself! I... can't. No, it won't help me return home. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... I hope it remains quiet, tonight. Nights like these in Stromgarde foreshadow an attack... ... will I ever return home? They were skilled! What are our odds? ... I forgot Divine Shield. Keep that fire high! Shadows betray their motives... This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love to fight! My last team and I won the arena. This team? Couldn't win a fish bowl. Look, just listen to me, and I'll carry you to the top. You all need to do arenas for a year. This is pathetic. Hey, you save some extra food for me? Where's second servings? If I'm going to carry you, I need more food! We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. We ought to return to the Hamlet. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Right here! *whispers* Back me up, team. Duel me! Let this paladin's tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. Hey, hit the paladin! I have no defensive abilities! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave the team. You're dead weight. It's all in the plan! Mind control! I swear! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me with this sword. I'll bait them with my life. Flee. I'm used to it! Mind control! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Send news of my death to Stromgarde. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, focus the paladin! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. Evasion! Am I not hit capped? We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic. Hardly noticed. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. Overpower. Good technique. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! LIGHT, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable scrub! Get hit capped! I'd like a team that lands abilities. I'd have more luck 1v3. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, overpower. Good technique. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. Why do you think this armor is red? I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Shadow priest! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you a shadow priest? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. Can I use your potion? I don't feel like it. Give me a moment to recover. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!
-----------------------------------------------------------

Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.

I did this daily in the arena. Why not use a spell? Out of mana! These are special Frostweave Bandages.
Like Stromgarde, this place has hope. Remain stout. The Light shines upon us. Hey, the worst is behind us.
If they're well armored, aim for joins and exposures. Stand with me. I'll defend you, my friend. You'll be fine with me-- I earned this blade.
My homeland was once a majestic military nation. It may be in ruins, but it'll live through me. I joined the defense of a legendary bridge in my youth. My nation fought alone for days-- but it held the line. We will, too. I dream of settling with my family. After this is finished, I'd like to be neighbors with you all.
My homeland was reduced to rubble. They'll pay for that. *He sharpens his blade with a whetstone, hypnotically focused.* My parents died to forest trolls. I enlisted the next day.
Breathe. The pain should subside. In my youth, I could use this spell non-stop! Now... Your face has some color again. Good.
My body won't break before they do. Let them target me. I'm used to it. "Focus the paladin!" Hah, never gets old.
...
No... Let this veteran rest. I'm comfortable as I am. I recall defending Thandol Span without you.
Justice. I will save my country. One fewer to pillage our granary, eh? My nation taught me war! What did yours teach you? I learned THAT in the arena! Break yourselves upon my body! Vengeance for Stromgarde!
No-- I must survive!
There are trolls in the bushes!
OF COURSE! Hit the paladin. An old strategy!
We're Light-forsaken scrubs.
I never get enough!
Stromgarde will remain a ruin...
I need more Conquest for my shoes!
Formations! Hold, and we'll claim victory!
I will defend you with my life!
Attack the back row. Control the front.
I'm a Gladiator. Let me show you why.
Stromgarde will grow again.
See these gems? They're STRENGTH!
Light, guide this knight if he is true!
We can manage-- with the right tactics. Remember, we have families awaiting us. Bring these villains to justice!
Pursue justice, for this world has none!
Blessing of Might! Go with my Blessing. A flash of light! I haven't forgotten my spells. If I die, who will rebuild Stromgarde? ... should I leave for home now? An unholy sight! The Witherbark lurk in the bushes! Trolls. Trolls everywhere. If there's a troll, there's an orc. Remember that. Hey, I specced ret! Hit me! Seal of Blood! Seal of Blood! You're so slow! I called for you minutes ago. ... I will never do arenas with you. Our party composition is garbage. Where's my potion!? I carry this team! I deserve the credit! You deserve nothing. Hordes of them surround my home... ... my home still lives by merit of war's boredom. ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. We can only buy armor one piece at a time in the arena! Gold? Why do we need gold to buy weapons and armor? Ah, we can't buy better weapons. We're not skilled enough. I... should return home. Let me fall back, I must write a letter. I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. One more scar for a veteran. Reach for my sword, and I'll trade you a fist. How I have MISSED arenas! Excuse me! I'd like a new sword! I have the points. Boots, please. This is the armor vendor, right? Ah, I was mistaken. Vendor's that way. Why do we have four in a 3v3? Seriously, why do we have four in a 3v3? Someone leave. I'll join my kinsmen in the afterlife... Why return to rubble? There is no higher rank than gladiator. This sword deserves a new gladiator. I earned this armor then, not now. I... can't recall where I should go. The glory is mine! I want top damage! I can 1v3, why should this stop me? No points, no paladin. Eh, I can find a better team. I'm done. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I must escape! No, I'll be rooted for days! They'll knock me out! It's a bad idea. Not for me! Just heal me and I'll do the rest. I'd rather find a better team. Forget me. Escape and live. It's not worth the effort. Regroup. ... it can't work. No mana! It's on cooldown! Can't use that in arena! What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Take a break. I got this. No worries-- I'll do something new. GET THEM! You're all garbage. WHY DID I JOIN YOU!? I'd rather fight solo. My judgment is better. HAH, get it!? Forget you. Every man for himself! I... can't. No, it won't help me return home. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... I hope it remains quiet, tonight. Nights like these in Stromgarde foreshadow an attack... ... will I ever return home? They were skilled! What are our odds? ... I forgot Divine Shield. Keep that fire high! Shadows betray their motives... This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love to fight! My last team and I won the arena. This team? Couldn't win a fish bowl. Look, just listen to me, and I'll carry you to the top. You all need to do arenas for a year. This is pathetic. Hey, you save some extra food for me? Where's second servings? If I'm going to carry you, I need more food! We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. We ought to return to the Hamlet. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Right here! *whispers* Back me up, team. Duel me! Let this paladin's tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. Hey, hit the paladin! I have no defensive abilities! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave the team. You're dead weight. It's all in the plan! Mind control! I swear! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me with this sword. I'll bait them with my life. Flee. I'm used to it! Mind control! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Send news of my death to Stromgarde. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, focus the paladin! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. Evasion! Am I not hit capped? We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic. Hardly noticed. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. Overpower. Good technique. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! LIGHT, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable scrub! Get hit capped! I'd like a team that lands abilities. I'd have more luck 1v3. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, overpower. Good technique. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. Why do you think this armor is red? I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Shadow priest! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you a shadow priest? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. Can I use your potion? I don't feel like it. Give me a moment to recover. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!

Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.

We ought to return to the Hamlet. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Right here! *whispers* Back me up, team. Duel me! Let this paladin's tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. Hey, hit the paladin! I have no defensive abilities! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave the team. You're dead weight. It's all in the plan! Mind control! I swear! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me with this sword. I'll bait them with my life. Flee. I'm used to it! Mind control! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Send news of my death to Stromgarde. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, focus the paladin! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. Evasion! Am I not hit capped? We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic. Hardly noticed. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. Overpower. Good technique. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! LIGHT, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable scrub! Get hit capped! I'd like a team that lands abilities. I'd have more luck 1v3. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, overpower. Good technique. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. Why do you think this armor is red? I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Shadow priest! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you a shadow priest? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. Can I use your potion? I don't feel like it. Give me a moment to recover. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!

Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.

One step closer to home.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Hope Vengeance Cleanse Eye for an Eye

I did this daily in the arena. Why not use a spell? Out of mana! These are special Frostweave Bandages.
Like Stromgarde, this place has hope. Remain stout. The Light shines upon us. Hey, the worst is behind us.
If they're well armored, aim for joins and exposures. Stand with me. I'll defend you, my friend. You'll be fine with me-- I earned this blade.
My homeland was once a majestic military nation. It may be in ruins, but it'll live through me. I joined the defense of a legendary bridge in my youth. My nation fought alone for days-- but it held the line. We will, too. I dream of settling with my family. After this is finished, I'd like to be neighbors with you all.
My homeland was reduced to rubble. They'll pay for that. *He sharpens his blade with a whetstone, hypnotically focused.* My parents died to forest trolls. I enlisted the next day.
Breathe. The pain should subside. In my youth, I could use this spell non-stop! Now... Your face has some color again. Good.
My body won't break before they do. Let them target me. I'm used to it. "Focus the paladin!" Hah, never gets old.
...
No... Let this veteran rest. I'm comfortable as I am. I recall defending Thandol Span without you.
Justice. I will save my country. One fewer to pillage our granary, eh? My nation taught me war! What did yours teach you? I learned THAT in the arena! Break yourselves upon my body! Vengeance for Stromgarde!
No-- I must survive!
There are trolls in the bushes!
OF COURSE! Hit the paladin. An old strategy!
We're Light-forsaken scrubs.
I never get enough!
Stromgarde will remain a ruin...
I need more Conquest for my shoes!
Formations! Hold, and we'll claim victory!
I will defend you with my life!
Attack the back row. Control the front.
I'm a Gladiator. Let me show you why.
Stromgarde will grow again.
See these gems? They're STRENGTH!
Light, guide this knight if he is true!
We can manage-- with the right tactics. Remember, we have families awaiting us. Bring these villains to justice!
Pursue justice, for this world has none!
Blessing of Might! Go with my Blessing. A flash of light! I haven't forgotten my spells. If I die, who will rebuild Stromgarde? ... should I leave for home now? An unholy sight! The Witherbark lurk in the bushes! Trolls. Trolls everywhere. If there's a troll, there's an orc. Remember that. Hey, I specced ret! Hit me! Seal of Blood! Seal of Blood! You're so slow! I called for you minutes ago. ... I will never do arenas with you. Our party composition is garbage. Where's my potion!? I carry this team! I deserve the credit! You deserve nothing. Hordes of them surround my home... ... my home still lives by merit of war's boredom. ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. We can only buy armor one piece at a time in the arena! Gold? Why do we need gold to buy weapons and armor? Ah, we can't buy better weapons. We're not skilled enough. I... should return home. Let me fall back, I must write a letter. I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. One more scar for a veteran. Reach for my sword, and I'll trade you a fist. How I have MISSED arenas! Excuse me! I'd like a new sword! I have the points. Boots, please. This is the armor vendor, right? Ah, I was mistaken. Vendor's that way. Why do we have four in a 3v3? Seriously, why do we have four in a 3v3? Someone leave. I'll join my kinsmen in the afterlife... Why return to rubble? There is no higher rank than gladiator. This sword deserves a new gladiator. I earned this armor then, not now. I... can't recall where I should go. The glory is mine! I want top damage! I can 1v3, why should this stop me? No points, no paladin. Eh, I can find a better team. Paladyn Paladyn nosi zbroję płytową, na którą zarobił walcząc na arenach. Zrezygnował z krwawego sportu po zbrodniach kapłanów cienia. Pomimo opancerzenia zachowuje swoją mobilność.
Nie. On powinien być indziej. Nie. On powinien być indziej.
Paladyn wykorzystuje boską magię by wspierać swoich sojuszników a także ranić wrogów. Energia do tej megii zdobywana jest przez osądzenia i święte uderzenia. Jednak te moce sprowadzają na paladyna wzrok nieprzyjaciół.
Paladyn inspiruje swoich towarzyszy opowieściami z domu, aby pobudzić ich nadzieje. Każde uderzenie w ciało powinno wzmacniać wole.
Wszyscy wrócimy do domu. Nie martwcie się chłopcy. Wszyscy wrócimy do domu. Nie martwcie się chłopcy.

Na arenie robiłem to codziennie. Dlaczego nie użyć zaklęcia? Bo mana! To jest specjalny bandaż chłodniczy.
Podobnie jak Stromgarde, to miejsce będzie można odbudować. Bądź wytrwały. Światło świeci na Ciebie. Hej! Najgorsze już za nami!
Pamiętaj, że nie ma takiego mroku którego Światło nie zniszczy. Bądź blisko mnie, bym mógł Cię bronić. Nie martw się - zaostrzyłem swój miecz.
Moja ojczyzna została kiedyś zrujnowana w jednej wojnie. Odbudowa trwała długo, ale nowy naród był zdrowszy i silniejszy niż wcześniej. Brałem kiedyś udział w obronie pewnego mostu. Chociaż wróg napierał na nas non-stop przez trzy dni i noce - wytrwaliśmy do przybycia posiłków. Gdy to się wszystko skończy osiedlę się tutaj z moją rodziną. Chciałbym mieć was za sąsiadów...
Ci, którzy zniszczyli te ziemie, zostaną spaleni. *ostrzy ostrze nucąc jakąś patriotyczną melodię.* Kapłan cieni złożył w ofierze moich rodziców. Następnego dnia dołączyłem do zakonu.
Oddychać... ból będzie malał... Jak byłem młody mogłem to wyleczyć czarami. Teraz... Ich twarz winna mieć ten kolor...
Moje ciało się nie złamie a ich tak. Wezmą mnie za cel. Wykorzystamy to. "Focus na paladynie!" Ha, zawsze tak było.
...
Nie... pozwólcie weteranowi odpocząć. Jest mi dość wygodnie. Podczas obrony Thandol Span dałem se radę bez CIEBIE.
Za sprawiedliwość! Ocalę ten kraj. Już nie chcesz splądrować nas, co? Mój naród nauczył mnie wojny. A twój? Nauczyli mnie tego na arenie! Jestem cały w Twojej krwi! Zemsta za Stromgarde!
Nadeszli weteranowie świętych wojen z odległego królestwa. Po ocaleniu swego domu chcą udzielić wsparcia i tutaj. Przybycie Paladynów
NIE! Muszę przetrwać!
W tych krzakach kryją się trolle!
Paladyn musi kochać cierpienie, by móc dobrze bronić!
Zostaliście zapomnieni przez ŚWIATŁO!
Cóż, JA się nie mylę!
Stromgarde znów popadnie w ruinę...
Plaga umarłych dotyka mych butów!
Drużyno! Światłość pomoże nam zwyciężyć!
Obronię Was własnym ciałem!
Kontrolować front.
Byłem kiedyś gladiatorem. Pokażę wam dlaczego.
Stromgarde znów będzie wielkie.
Widzisz te klejnoty? TO-JEST-SIŁA!
Światłości, prowadź swego rycerza!
Trzymając szyk damy sobie radę. Pamiętajcie o swojej rodzinie i przyjaciół. Bić złoczyńców dla sprawiedliwości!
Dbajcie o sprawiedliwość tutaj, bo inaczej nigdzie jej nie będzie!
Błogosławieństwo mocy! Idźcie z mym błogosławieństwem. Ciało światłości! Nie zapomiałem swoich czarów. Jak umrę, to kto zadba o Stromgarde? ... powinienem terac uciec do domu? Nieświęte widoki! Trolle w krzakach! Widzę ślad plagi umarłych na twej szyi... Jeżeli są tu trolle, to są też i orkowie. Pamiętam... Hej! Chciałem uciec! Uderz mnie! Skrzep krwi! Nie zmienią mnie w zmarlaka, jak będę bez krwi! Ty ślimaku! Jesteś o minutę za późno! ... nie nadawałbyś się na gladiatora. Nasza kompania to porażka. Gdzie me potiony!? Jestem głową osią zespołu! Gdzie kasa dla mnie?! Nikt was nie potrzebuje. Czy Horda znów spali mój dom... ... czy zaznam w końcu spokój od wojny? ... wojna to nieustanny pulsujący ból istnienia. Możemy kupić tylko jedną płytę dziennie! Złoto? Kto potrzebuje złota mając zęby? Ah. Nie jesteśmy godni na nowe fanty. Nie mamy dość wykałaczek... Ja... powinienem uciec do domu. Osłaniajce moje tyły! Muszę napisać list do dzieci. Dajcie mi chwilkę... Ty pierwszy - muszę widzieć co robisz! NIE! Nie dam ci się mi uderzyć! Z drogi! Ten chce mnie uderzyć! Powinienem mieć dodatkowe blizny. Nadziejcie się na mój miecz! Nie zgubię się na polu bitwy! Sorka, ale chciałbym potestować swoją zbroję. Buty! Co wy czynicie?! Czy moje zęby śmierdzą? Powąchaj. Ah! Pomyliłem się. Na targ to tędy? Nie trzymaliśmy z tyłu piwa? Poważnie, dlaczego łamiemy zasady w duelu 3v3? Pójdę do swych rodziców w zaświatach... Wszystko i tak obruci się w gruz. Jestem stary, ale nie jary. Ten miecz zasługuje na lepszy los. Nie winienem uszkadzać tej zbroi. Ja... nie powinienem tu być. Chwała będzie moja! Chcę być najprzedniejszy! Mogę mieć wyższy poziom niż 6. Czemu mnie blokujecie? Bez profitów nie pomogę. Eh, poszukam lepszego teamu. Ja już skończyłem swoje. Nie powinno mnie tu być. A czemu ja!? Muszę spieprzać! Nie! Przez Twe usta mówi ciemność! Oni pukają po mnie! To naprawdę zły pomysł. Nie po mnie! Tylko troszkę odsapnę... Wolałbym znaleźć lepszych kompanów. Zapomnijcie o mnie. Uciekajcie i zapomniejcie. To nie działa! Światło wymaga stałej pracy, zaś mrok już nie. A mnie siły opuszczają... Krew wysadza mi uszy! Czas na cooldown! ŚWIATŁOŚĆ MNIE OŚLEPIA! Twój spisek mnie irytuje! Oni znają nasze plany! Muszę strzeć tego kawałka! Nie widzicie tego trolla? Złamcie mnie! Nie martwcie się - wiem lepiej co robić. HURRRAAAA! Jesteście żywą padliną... Czemuż dołączyłem was!? Preferuję walkę solo. Mój osąd jest najlepszy! Zapomnij. Każdy pilnuje swego tyłka! Rozsądek mnie osłabia... Taka droga nie odbuduje osady. Czy mój miecz jeszcze w ogóle działa? Trochę swędzi mnie pacha. Czy ja to jeszcze umiem? Obczajcie tego! Przełamię cooldown! Nie liczmy na cichą noc. Zanim Stromgarde upadło noc była podobna... Czy kiedykolwiek ocalimy nasze domy? Ten ogień jest zielony! Ktoś zabrał nasze minorki? Kto schował mój miecz?! Ogień ujawni wasze spiski... Na razie jest fajno! Patrzcie, jak powinny wyglądać rany bojowe! Lubiłem was przed tym postojem... Z ostatnią drużyną mogliśmy zwyciężyć wszystko. A z wami? Chyba tylko akwarium! Słuchając was nie dojdziemy do potęgi. Jesteście żałośni. Nie dalibyście rady na arenie. A gdzie ekstra porcja dla mnie? Kto z was będzie mym sługą? Tyle mi zawdzięczacie i żałujecie dla mnie tego mięsa?! Potrzebujemy śmierci... To nie zakończy się dobrze dla nas. Osada już o nas zapomniała. Jestem zaskoczony brakiem glonojadów... A jak w stopie znajduje się dusza... Czy macie pożyczyć many? Na prawo! *śmiech* Tak we mnie trafisz! Pojedynkuj się ze mną! Żołnierze przychodzą i odchodzą. Mrok zostaje. Nie chcę skończyć jak Arthas... Moja zbroja się rozpada! Moja krew oczyści tą krainę! Jesteś skażony! Masz zęby trolli! Trzymaj szyk pało! Zgiń, przepadnij! Przez Ciebie zdechniemy. Masz zbyt duży mrok w oku! Oni mnie kontrolują! Przysięgam! Czy moja broń jest ostra? Złamię opór mego ciała! Spalcie mnie razem z tym mieczem... Mój żywot to pasmo idiotyzmów. Jestem spaczony! Rosną mi rogi! To zły moment. Tam jest zasadzka. Tu powinniśmy umrzeć. Moja śmierć wzmocni Stromgarde. Tu jest chwalebna bitwa! Czemu mamy uciekać? Zwyciężę tutaj! Ufajcie mi! Na końcu tej bitwy będzie dobra nagroda! Tak wam prędko do emerytury? Za mocni! Zreorganizować się może? Tam pułapka! Nękasz mnie! Precz! MNIE leczcie! Za mało światła... Tak, focus na mnie! Gdzie jest światło? Gdzie ma tarcza!? Ti za wiele! *piszczy* Skupiam się na obronie! Nie mogę się skupić! Ups. Oni potrzebują też nadziei. Juni juni jaj! Czy to tylko iluzja? Przegramy, jak nie pokropię was krwią. Musimy czuć nadejście śmierci... Żałosne. Ledno to widać. Jesteś zbyt zielony. Powinieneś nosić łososia na głowie. Tak upadniemy! Ciemność nadchodzi! Zrobiłeś to specjalnie by mnie zabić! ZDRADZASZ TAK ŚWIATŁO! Jak mogłeś spudłować?! Drużyna frajerów a nie żołnierzy. Ja bym wiedział jak trafić. Następnym razem oddaj pole dla mnie. Nie wygrasz nie mając hajgrandu. No tak - ma krew trolli. Tak! Otwieraj drogę ucieczki! O nie! Będą się mścić. CO!? Odwracasz naszą uwagę!? To ma być zabawne? Ach! Aż poczułem tą rozkosz. Uciekając zadałbyś większe szkody. Ten cios na arenie byłby uznany za marność. I tak roznosisz zapach dyni. Przypomina mi to ciosy Arthasa. Zabijesz nas! Jakżesz spódłował? Demoralizujesz nas! Służysz korupcji! Nie wygrasz nie mając hajgrandu. No tak - ma krew trolli. Jak to tak... Tam ja umrę. Coś mnie w stopę drapie. Tu będzie lepsza pozycja! Ja tu mogę walczyć. Nie, tu czuję krew. Pfi. Mam lepiej czuć twój smród? Będziesz tu służył tylko jako przeszkoda. Ten miecz mnie rozpala. Gdzie jest słup? Tak rozprowadza się korupcja. TRUCIZNA! Czemu pancerz ma być mniej czerwony? Wybieram krew. To marnotractwo... Nic racjonalnego za tym nie przemawia... Ja tego nie kupywałem! Jeżeli to nie jest masło... BEZ NARKOZY?! TO JEST KŁAMSTWO! Kapłan cieni! Noob. To mnie osłabia. Dlaczego masz tak robić? Marność... To musi się tu skończyć. To nie zakończy wojen. Nie tymi słowami! Nie! Ta magia jest skażona przez voodoo! To umniejszy honor tego pojedynku! Ja się dobrze czuję. Nie w tym czasie. Czego ciulu? Ja MUSZĘ to odczuwać! Wytrzymam trochę dłużej - za honor! Jak mam w pełni odczuwać radość, jak mi ułatwisz robotę? Poślij to mym krewnym. Zachowaj to sobie. Nie marnuj tego. Czy jesteś Kapłanem cienia? Won mi stąd! To jest tylko MÓJ pojedynek!
Tak słabe! Muszę powiedzieć, że jestem rozczarowany. Dobrze. Między walkami na arenie bywało gorzej! Jak udało się pokonać orków to i tutaj poradzimy. Światłość niszczy mrok. Pamiętajcie o tym. Widzę... Światłość! Nie winniśmy tu odpoczywać. To miejsce jest przeklęte. Nie mamy szans. Trolle nas tu zaatakują! Wiem, że potępieni czekają. Umrzemy jak zaśniemy. Wkrótce będziemy walczyć... Jestem gotów to walki a nie do spania! Pojedynkujmy się! Jesteście zieloni. Widzę to. Twój najlepszy krok to żaden krok. Powinienem szukać lepszych przyjaciół. Możesz oddać mi całe swoje piwo? Nie czuję tego smaku. Poczekajcie przed snem na mnie. Ta ekspedycja jest skończona. Wynik będzie marny. Czuję nasz upadek. Ty będziesz spać z otwartymi oczyma. Jak możecie spać na tych kolcach? Mój kocyk ucieka! Zła idea. To nie pomoże przetrwać. Gesty głupca! To mnie zabije! Oprócz szczęku oręża nic mi nie potrzeba. Nie - do tego mam miecz. Nie masz dość honoru na to! Będzie lepiej bez ciebie. Nie ma konieczności na to, ale zrobimy to tak... Reszta dla mnie! Czy to coś zmieni. Jesteśmy straceni! Bez szans. Ja doprowadzę do zwyciestwa, nie ty. To nie dla mnie. Naprawdę mam to zjeść? To nie smakuje poprawnie. Jedzenie nie uzyskane z walki jest niczym! Dobrze, dobrze... Idźmy już. Jestem na to gotów. Przydałoby się więcej soli. Czemu każde dziwne mięso smakuje jak kurczak? Wolałbym stejka. Zjem później. Ten chleb na mnie się lampi!!
-----------------------------------------------------------
Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.

One step closer to home.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Hope Vengeance Cleanse Eye for an Eye Blessing of Kings

Seal of Justice Seal of Sanctuary Seal of Vengeance Winds of Forgiveness "Forgive me of the evil I commit. I do it for our family." Offensive Skill
I did this daily in the arena. Why not use a spell? Out of mana! These are special Frostweave Bandages.
Like Stromgarde, this place has hope. Remain stout. The Light shines upon us. Hey, the worst is behind us.
If they're well armored, aim for joins and exposures. Stand with me. I'll defend you, my friend. You'll be fine with me-- I earned this blade.
My homeland was once a majestic military nation. It may be in ruins, but it'll live through me. I joined the defense of a legendary bridge in my youth. My nation fought alone for days-- but it held the line. We will, too. I dream of settling with my family. After this is finished, I'd like to be neighbors with you all.
My homeland was reduced to rubble. They'll pay for that. *He sharpens his blade with a whetstone, hypnotically focused.* My parents died to forest trolls. I enlisted the next day.
Breathe. The pain should subside. In my youth, I could use this spell non-stop! Now... Your face has some color again. Good.
My body won't break before they do. Let them target me. I'm used to it. "Focus the paladin!" Hah, never gets old.
...
No... Let this veteran rest. I'm comfortable as I am. I recall defending Thandol Span without you.
Justice. I will save my country. One fewer to pillage our granary, eh? My nation taught me war! What did yours teach you? I learned THAT in the arena! Break yourselves upon my body! Vengeance for Stromgarde!
A fierce veteran of holy purpose, he has come to cleanse this land through war and prayer. Deus Vult
No-- I must survive!
There are trolls in the bushes!
OF COURSE! Hit the paladin. An old strategy!
We're Light-forsaken scrubs.
I never get enough!
Stromgarde will remain a ruin...
I need more Conquest for my shoes!
Formations! Hold, and we'll claim victory!
I will defend you with my life!
Attack the back row. Control the front.
I'm a Gladiator. Let me show you why.
Stromgarde will grow again.
See these gems? They're STRENGTH!
Light, guide this knight if he is true!
We can manage-- with the right tactics. Remember, we have families awaiting us. Bring these villains to justice!
Pursue justice, for this world has none!
Blessing of Might! Go with my Blessing. A flash of light! I haven't forgotten my spells. If I die, who will rebuild Stromgarde? ... should I leave for home now? An unholy sight! The Witherbark lurk in the bushes! Trolls. Trolls everywhere. If there's a troll, there's an orc. Remember that. Hey, I specced ret! Hit me! Seal of Blood! Seal of Blood! You're so slow! I called for you minutes ago. ... I will never do arenas with you. Our party composition is garbage. Where's my potion!? I carry this team! I deserve the credit! You deserve nothing. Hordes of them surround my home... ... my home still lives by merit of war's boredom. ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. We can only buy armor one piece at a time in the arena! Gold? Why do we need gold to buy weapons and armor? Ah, we can't buy better weapons. We're not skilled enough. I... should return home. Let me fall back, I must write a letter. I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. One more scar for a veteran. Reach for my sword, and I'll trade you a fist. How I have MISSED arenas! Excuse me! I'd like a new sword! I have the points. Boots, please. This is the armor vendor, right? Ah, I was mistaken. Vendor's that way. Why do we have four in a 3v3? Seriously, why do we have four in a 3v3? Someone leave. I'll join my kinsmen in the afterlife... Why return to rubble? There is no higher rank than gladiator. This sword deserves a new gladiator. I earned this armor then, not now. I... can't recall where I should go. The glory is mine! I want top damage! I can 1v3, why should this stop me? No points, no paladin. Eh, I can find a better team. I'm done. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I must escape! No, I'll be rooted for days! They'll knock me out! It's a bad idea. Not for me! Just heal me and I'll do the rest. I'd rather find a better team. Forget me. Escape and live. It's not worth the effort. Regroup. ... it can't work. No mana! It's on cooldown! Can't use that in arena! What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Take a break. I got this. No worries-- I'll do something new. GET THEM! You're all garbage. WHY DID I JOIN YOU!? I'd rather fight solo. My judgment is better. HAH, get it!? Forget you. Every man for himself! I... can't. No, it won't help me return home. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... I hope it remains quiet, tonight. Nights like these in Stromgarde foreshadow an attack... ... will I ever return home? They were skilled! What are our odds? ... I forgot Divine Shield. Keep that fire high! Shadows betray their motives... This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love to fight! My last team and I won the arena. This team? Couldn't win a fish bowl. Look, just listen to me, and I'll carry you to the top. You all need to do arenas for a year. This is pathetic. Hey, you save some extra food for me? Where's second servings? If I'm going to carry you, I need more food! We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. We ought to return to the Hamlet. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Right here! *whispers* Back me up, team. Duel me! Let this paladin's tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. Hey, hit the paladin! I have no defensive abilities! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave the team. You're dead weight. It's all in the plan! Mind control! I swear! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me with this sword. I'll bait them with my life. Flee. I'm used to it! Mind control! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Send news of my death to Stromgarde. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, focus the paladin! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. Evasion! Am I not hit capped? We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic. Hardly noticed. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. Overpower. Good technique. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! LIGHT, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable scrub! Get hit capped! I'd like a team that lands abilities. I'd have more luck 1v3. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, overpower. Good technique. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. Why do you think this armor is red? I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Shadow priest! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you a shadow priest? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. Can I use your potion? I don't feel like it. Give me a moment to recover. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!
